flex2.linker

Class SimpleMovie

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.swf.Movie
      • flex2.linker.SimpleMovie

  • public class SimpleMovie
extends flash.swf.Movie
    Represents a simple single frame Movie. It's currently not instantiated directly. Instead, it's subclasses for special purposes like an application SWF or a library SWF.
    Author:
    Clement Wong

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleMovie

        public SimpleMovie(LinkerConfiguration configuration)
        MD5 password is no longer needed for Flash Player. Use this dummy password instead of generating one.
        See Also:
        http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-27210
